transArray.content: I'm so satisfied. It's so convenient to have this hotel near my home. It's very clean and the service is very good. The TV can also project the screen. The curtains and lights in the room are all smart. I had a great stay. I will come here often in the future.
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
